Question
========
  
To investigate whether there is a difference in memory recall between people with
Parkinson's disease and people without Parkinson's disease, a random sample of 12
participants is selected from both groups and asked to participate in the research. 
The results are presented in the table below. Calculate the 95% confidence interval 
for the difference in self-regulation.
